title: PMS 2.0 536 - Thursday Night Football Preview, OBJ To The LA Rams, Ian Rapoport, Shams Charania, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys chat about tonight's Thursday Night Football game between the Ravens and the Dolphins, OBJ shocking everyone and going to the Rams, Cam Newton officially signing with the Carolina Panthers likely to be their starting Quarterback for the rest of the season, and whether or not Sam Darnold is going to get another opportunity in the NFL. Joining the program to chat about tonight's game, OBJ watch and what he's currently hearing in terms of OBJ, and everything else going around in the NFL as we start week 10 (58:42-1:20:43). Later, NBA Insider for Stadium and The Athletic, and friend of the program, Shams Charania joins the show to chat about everything going on in the NBA right now, what we need to be looking at going forward and what the hell the deal with Zion Williamson is (1:36:59-1:51:09). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
